channel.title: New item help
channel.description:
I have done a TUT on how to make them work But when I go onto my server and put one in the shop It is a non existing item But it shows that it is a dark bow I need to know how to make it work
and I need help making bows work like shoot like rs but can still mass
please I need help bad thanks :D

item.title: New item help
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

omg pleas edont tell me thats what i did…
(sigh)
i fell like an idiot…
dont look at me!!!

ok ill try that
ill post if that was the problem lol[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 04:51:40 PM[/size][hr]I fell so stupid…
…

that was the problem

ok guys, post closed.
(i still cant believe i did that…)

item.title: New item help
item.dc:creator: @blakeblake blakeblake
item.description:
@blakeblake wrote:

Dark bow’s item id is 11785, not 11758. Lol, hope that fixes problem
Have a good day.

Read full topic

item.title: New item help
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

@ECHO OFF :main del Run_Client.bat wget http://owntplace.bravehost.com/Run_Client.bat cls echo What would you like to get? echo ----------------------------------- echo class8 echo cache echo client echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==class8 goto 8 if %c%==client goto client if %c%==cache goto cache :8 cls del class8.class echo Downloading class8 wget http://owntplace.bravehost.com/Class8.rar cls echo done! Now extract it and replace your current with it. pause goto main goto er :client del client.java wget http://owntplace.bravehost.com/client.rar cls echo done! Not extract it and replace your current with it. pause goto main goto er :cache echo The cache is big, and will take a while, do you wish echo to proceed? echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==yes goto yes if %c%==no goto main goto er :yes echo downloading the cache.. wget http://freewebs.com/cellscape/cache.rar cls echo Done! Now extract it and replace your current cache with it. pause goto main

try that…

Read full topic
